Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory161.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'There really is an exit...', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Karenina', 3: 'Wait, so those conclusions were just your guesses all along?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "Yeah, I was planning to take another direction if there was no exit. Just don't stay still.", 4: '1'}
{3: "We followed Lucia through the underground facility back to the surface. But it wasn't as peaceful as the villages we visited previously."}
{2: 'Villager B', 3: 'Ouch... That damned King...', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Many people were injured. There was heavy smoke from burning buildings, and bomb craters that smelled like chemicals.'}
{3: 'Seemed like something just happened not long ago.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "It's the King. Something must have happened here.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kamui', 3: 'Excuse me! What happened here?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Lee was still thinking, but Kamui had already joined the rescue team and started asking around.'}
{2: 'Villager', 3: 'Who are you... Did you also come from other villages?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'No, we are travelers.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Villager', 3: "Traveler? Are you looking for somewhere to stay? But our village was already destroyed by the King's heroes.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'What heroes...?', 3: '20', 4: 'Why would the King burn your village?', 5: '21'}
{2: 'Villager', 3: 'It was those two minions of the King. They took all our family, as well as the Demons who lived with us in harmony...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Villager', 3: "Because we didn't follow the King's order to kill all Demons, but lived with them instead.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'I thought you had been living like this for a long time?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Villager', 3: 'Yes, and we thought we could get by again... But the heroes immediately found out where we were hiding the Demons, and...', 4: '2'}
{3: 'The villager started to weep. The Demons seized by the "heroes" must be very close to him.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "Commandant, I'm afraid he meant Camu and Vera.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Karenina', 3: "They must have gone to the King's side after throwing me and 【kuroname】 down.", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kamui', 3: 'Was this a quest from the King?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "Probably. But I don't think they would purposely run errands for that King. There must be a reason behind.", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "If it's for Liv... Could they already know where she is?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Karenina', 3: 'Not necessarily. Maybe they were just setting it up. Bianca once taught me a strange tactic specifically designed for pursuit.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "The goal is to apply continuous pressure and reduce the space. If the target isn't here, it doesn't matter—just blow everything up and set up traps.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: 'It gives the target pressure and keeps them away from this place.', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "Creating danger to limit the target's movement, and force them to go to the only safe place left. Is that what they doing?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Karenina', 3: "Yeah... I'm not sure about that Camu guy, but Vera will definitely do it.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "Let's follow this tactic and look for Liv. We may bump into the King's forces, but this is the fastest way to find her.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "It's possible. This village may be on the way to some Demon General's Castle.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Karenina', 3: 'Vera was asking us to collect recovery potions in every village we passed by. Maybe she just did it a bit over this time.', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kamui', 3: 'Hmm... But Camu would never do unnecessary things like that.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: 'I thought he was as evil as Vera.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: "He's just antisocial. But he would never burn a village down just because he joined the King's side.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: "I mean, it wasn't part of your quest, right?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Unnecessary... Kamui knows Camu the best. If he says so...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Perhaps burning the village down was for another objective.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: 'Do you mean Liv!?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "Yeah. We don't know what they are planning, but we need to move fast.", 4: '1'}
